entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Amos
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
